amendment.description: Amendment provides that if school districts use Title I money for after school, before school, or summer school activities, they would be required to describe those activities in their local plans.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 114-29 stating that if school districts use Title I money for after school, before school, or summer school activities, it would require them to describe those activities in their local plans.
